resume_text:
Abhishek Jha

Hind Motor High School kolkata

Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, it's nice to meet you.  Thanks for your time.

Your resume mentions experience with React. Can you tell me about a challenge you faced while using React, and how you overcame it?

technicalSkills.assessment: Abhishek's resume shows familiarity with React, React Native, Express, Firebase, and Redux.  However, the interview only touched upon React.  The lack of detail about the challenge faced in using React prevents a thorough assessment of his practical skills.  The project description is incomplete, hindering a full understanding of his proficiency in those technologies.  More information is needed to determine his depth of knowledge and problem-solving skills with these technologies.

communicationSkills.assessment: Based on the limited interaction, Abhishek's communication style appears to be polite and professional.  However, the absence of his response to the interviewer's question about a challenge with React prevents a comprehensive evaluation of his ability to articulate technical problems and solutions clearly and concisely.

problemSolvingAbilities.assessment: Abhishek's problem-solving skills remain largely unassessed.  The interview question aimed to evaluate this aspect, but his response is missing.  His projects, while mentioned, lack sufficient detail to evaluate his problem-solving approach and ability to manage complex tasks.

culturalFit.assessment: Based on the brief introduction, Abhishek seems to have a polite and professional demeanor, but further interaction would be necessary to assess his cultural fit within a specific team or company environment.

strengths: Familiarity with several relevant technologies (React, React Native, Express, Firebase, Redux)
weaknesses: Lack of demonstrated ability to articulate technical challenges and solutions
Incomplete project descriptions, preventing a full evaluation of skills and experience
Absence of detail on the technologies listed on his resume
Resume lacks quantifiable achievements in projects.

overallImpression.assessment: The interview provided a limited insight into Abhishek's technical abilities and problem-solving skills.  His resume suggests potential, but more information is crucial for a proper evaluation.  Further questioning is needed during the interview to gauge his technical depth and communication skills effectively.

recommendationsForImprovement: Prepare specific examples of technical challenges faced and overcome while working with technologies mentioned in the resume.
Provide detailed descriptions of past projects, highlighting roles, responsibilities, technologies used, and quantifiable achievements.
Practice explaining complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
Improve the resume by adding quantifiable achievements to demonstrate the impact of his work on projects.
